headline: West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Pressure
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) has been drawing attention after recent trading pressure, with the share price down around 16% over the past month and about 18% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for West Pharmaceutical Services. That recent selling comes on top of a wider reset, with a 30 day share price return of 16% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 32%, suggesting momentum has been fading despite the latest close at $231.12.
